extendedProjectWizard_notAuthorized_titl: You must be logged in to use the extended project configurator
extendedProjectWizard_notAuthorized_teas: Don't have an account yet? You can register here...
extendedProjectWizard_wizard_teaser: You get the full project configurator experience here in the extended wizard. If you wish, you can enter all details of the upcoming project here. Define features, structure and design, as well as content for each page or special requests. Projects captured here can be commissioned directly, and results are available in record time.
getStarted_meta_description: Start your project with our configurator.
getStarted_teaser_description: Choose the right configurator to start your project and get a first estimate.
getStarted_benefits_fast_description: Get a first estimate in just a few minutes.
getStarted_benefits_transparent_descript: Full cost control and clear overview of services.
getStarted_benefits_documentation_descri: All steps and decisions are recorded.
getStarted_cta_description: Choose your configurator now and get started!
getStarted_wizardSelection_basicConfigur: Quickly get an approximate price estimate. The Basic Configurator can serve as a first indicator and is done in 1 minute.
getStarted_wizardSelection_advancedConfi: Capture your entire project in detail. Manage the result in your personal dashboard.
getStarted_registrationPrompt_descriptio: Would you like to configure your project in detail and make it more concrete? To use the advanced wizard and save your project, please create an account.
This will give you access to your personal dashboard, where you can manage multiple projects. Your email address is sufficient for registration.
wizard_stepCategory_titleSecond: Which direction are we going to take?
wizard_stepCategory_teaser: Is your idea a typical website or web application project? Or are you looking into a more individual or specialized approach? Please choose the category first.
wizard_stepType_teaser: Let us refine your vision a bit. Choose the appropriate option!
wizard_stepSubType_teaser: What kind of {project} would you like to tackle?
wizard_stepFeatures_titleSecond: do you want for your project?
wizard_stepFeatures_teaser: The more detailed you specify the expected scope here, the more accurate and reliable the price estimate can be!
wizard_stepBasicDetails_titleSecond: and your idea in more detail
wizard_stepBasicDetails_teaser: It helps us a lot to better understand your expectations and estimate an appropriate budget if you provide some details here.
wizard_stepContent_titleSecond: and your idea in more detail
wizard_stepContent_teaser: It helps us a lot to better understand your expectations and estimate an appropriate price if you provide some details here.
wizard_stepSummary_teaser: Here you get a first assessment of your project. This is how we understood it, and these are the costs to expect for a professional implementation.
wizard_categories_websitesAndApps_descri: Take off directly: Whether one-pager, standard corporate website, large content site or complex web application. You're in the right place.
wizard_categories_kiAndFreestyle_descrip: Complicated or complex: If your project is more specialized, you can request your individual development project or AI solutions here.
wizard_type_website_description: Any format, any scope. You need a great website with or without content management? Individual & Professional!
wizard_type_app_description: You need a simple web app, complex business application or PWA? Your existing website as an app? Then this is the way to go.
wizard_type_aiSolution: AI – the superpower for your business
wizard_type_aiSolution_description: You want to use AI profitably in your company? Start a concrete AI project? Agents, bots, workflows? This way...
wizard_type_freestyle_description: You have a very special project in mind? Something that doesn't fit anywhere else? We can help you here too. The solution: custom development.
wizard_subTypes_onepager_description: Is a single page without bells and whistles enough for you? Do you simply want to be reachable under your own domain? Or do you need a maintenance page? Get your basic information (e.g. opening hours) online quickly and easily.
wizard_subTypes_onepagerPlus_description: Classic one-pager. On a single page (with anchor navigation) all information about a topic, product, event, etc. is presented. Use this option for an affordable and straightforward campaign page (landing page).
wizard_subTypes_corporateWebsite_descrip: The absolute standard. A professional and secure corporate presence on the internet. Up to 5 individual content pages, legal notice, privacy policy, contact form, GDPR compliance... Hosting and maintenance for one year are already included.
wizard_subTypes_corporateWebsitePlus_des: Every website project is always individual, enriched with a variety of features. If it's clear upfront that the project will be larger (30+ content pages, diverse functionality and integrations), then the Corporate Website Plus package is the right choice.
wizard_subTypes_cms_description: Content management isn't always necessary, but usually makes sense. It can range from simple maintenance of individual sections or objects of an existing website to highly complex and extensive setups. Start your CMS project here.
wizard_subTypes_cmsPlus_description: Editorial systems with many individual information objects or headless use of content modules. We also offer the implementation of individual and complex CMS solutions. Choose this option if your CMS project is larger.
wizard_subTypes_webApp_description: Websites and web applications are quite similar. Under the hood, web applications are usually much more complex (data, interfaces, permissions). Whether performance dashboard, control center or mini portal – we develop the best solution for you.
wizard_subTypes_pwaSimple_description: A PWA is the best way to turn a website or web application into a versatile mobile app. It's installable, works offline and can access device features (location, camera, sensors, etc.).
wizard_subTypes_pwaExtended_description: The simple PWA option includes upgrading an existing website to a Progressive Web App. If you want to start from scratch and implement complex functions and use cases, it becomes a completely different project.
wizard_subTypes_individualApp_descriptio: A web application can also be very individual. We help you implement even the wildest ideas. With our approach, we deliver the perfect foundation that can be flexibly expanded into something truly great.
wizard_subTypes_aiConsulting_description: Whether on-site workshop, analysis of optimizable processes in your company or assistance with specific challenges. Strategic AI consulting is available here.
wizard_subTypes_agenticAi_description: Your own AI that is capable of acting independently in complex environments and making decisions. Let's build your own specialized AI agent together.
wizard_subTypes_generativeAi: Generative AI - Digital Assets in No Time
wizard_subTypes_generativeAi_description: Text, images, audio, video, code, data and much more can be generated with AI more easily than ever. Build your own generative AI with us that doesn't guess, but produces results in your style.
wizard_subTypes_bots_description: Dialog-based chat systems have been around for a while. We take it a step further with AI and implement virtual customer advisors, salespeople, support agents, etc. – that talk to you and understand you!
wizard_subTypes_workflowAutomation_descr: Thanks to AI, business processes can be automated much more effectively. Onboarding new employees, order processes, accounting, reports, etc. – there are 1,000 use cases. Which one is yours?
wizard_subTypes_individualAi_description: The power of AI – when used correctly – brings enormous potential. Core applications are quickly identified, but there are so many possibilities to get creative with AI. Start your individual AI project.
wizard_subTypes_individualConsulting_des: Are you looking for expert support for a project? Or completely individual consulting on IT topics? Want to rent expertise instead of hiring? Book IT experts by the day for your freestyle project here.
wizard_subTypes_fullDevelopment_descript: Do you want to have larger individual projects implemented holistically, or bind resources long-term in demanding development projects? This is the right path.
wizard_subTypes_partDevelopment_descript: We also develop individual components, modules, frontends, UIs, libraries, etc. – for small but specialized, individual development tasks, choose this option.
wizard_features_contactForm_description: A custom contact form that captures all inquiries.
wizard_features_newsletterRegistration_d: Newsletter sign-up with email validation and double opt-in
wizard_features_chatbot_description: AI-powered chatbot for customer service and consulting
wizard_features_voicebot_description: AI-powered voicebot for customer service and consulting
wizard_features_appointments_description: Online appointment booking system with calendar integration
wizard_features_imageGallery_description: Responsive image gallery with lightbox functionality and categorization
wizard_features_videoEmbedding_descripti: Responsive video embedding with player controls
wizard_features_portfolioGrid_descriptio: Responsive portfolio grid for showcasing work
wizard_features_calendar_description: Interactive calendar with event management and appointment display
wizard_features_fileUpload_description: Secure file upload functionality with validation and preview
wizard_features_megaMenu_description: Advanced navigation with multi-level dropdown menus
wizard_features_customTeaser_description: Custom teaser components for content and products
wizard_features_customCarousel_descripti: Custom carousel component for images and content
wizard_features_accordeon_description: Collapsible content sections for FAQ and structured content
wizard_features_tabs_description: Tab navigation for clear content presentation
wizard_features_themeSwitcher_descriptio: Dark/Light mode toggle and custom theme selection
wizard_features_search_description: Intelligent search function for website content with filter options
wizard_features_customFilter_description: Advanced filter functions for product catalogs and content
wizard_features_multiStepDialog_descript: Multi-step forms and dialogs for complex inputs
wizard_features_assistant_description: Digital assistant for user guidance and help
wizard_features_rating_description: Rating and review system for products or services
wizard_features_payment_description: Secure online payment processing with various payment providers
wizard_features_userAccounts_description: User management with registration, login and profile management
wizard_features_ageVerification_descript: Age verification system for age-restricted content
wizard_features_accessibility_descriptio: Accessibility features for better usability and WCAG compliance
wizard_features_mapsIntegration_descript: Google Maps, Mapbox or OpenStreetMap integration with location markers
wizard_features_socialMediaIntegration_d: Integration of social media feeds and sharing buttons
wizard_features_analyticsIntegration_des: Integration of Google Analytics, Matomo or other tracking tools
wizard_features_seo_description: Search engine optimization with meta tags, schema markup and performance
wizard_features_marketingTools_descripti: A/B testing, conversion tracking and marketing automation
wizard_features_localization_description: Multilingual support with automatic language detection
wizard_features_virtualTour_description: Map your premises in 3D and make them accessible on your website
wizard_steps_step1_teaser: Choose the type of your project. This selection determines the available options in the following steps.
wizard_steps_step2_teaser: Choose the appropriate variant for your project. Each option has different features and prices.
wizard_steps_step3_teaser: The more detailed you describe your project, the more accurately we can calculate a price for you.
wizard_steps_step4_teaser: Select all the features you want. Each feature expands the possibilities of your project and affects the price.
wizard_steps_step5_teaser: Define the structure and content of your project. This information helps us with planning and implementation.
wizard_steps_step5_content_pages_descrip: What pages or sections should your website have? Also describe the desired content for each page.
wizard_steps_step6_teaser: Define the visual appearance of your project. These settings determine the look and feel.
wizard_steps_stepMaterials_teaser: Upload relevant documents, specifications or other materials that help us with implementation.
wizard_steps_stepMaterials_files_descrip: Upload specifications, wireframes, existing documentation or other relevant files.
wizard_steps_stepMaterials_files_formats: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG, AI, PSD, TXT, XLSX, PPTX
wizard_steps_stepSummary_teaser: Review your configuration. You can return to previous steps at any time to make changes.
wizard_steps_stepSummary_pdfGeneration_e: Error creating PDF. Please try again.
wizard_steps_stepSummary_disclaimer: *Non-binding estimate. The final price will be determined after a personal conversation.
wizard_steps_stepSummary_fontPreview: Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Reiciendis minima officia eveniet fugiat ad dicta quia optio quod possimus sint enim doloremque, consectetur ut est quibusdam corporis obcaecati dolore dolores!
wizard_steps_stepSummary_priceTiers_tier: This is manageable. We can almost certainly offer the lowest price.
A few features have been selected, but the complexity is still moderate: mid-range price.
The project is not trivial. There are several requested features. We are at the upper end.
What you have in mind is quite demanding. Many or very complex features are included. We will likely need the full range and may even be slightly above it.
wizard_steps_priceTiers_tier1_message: Your project is manageable, we are certainly at the lower end of the price range.
wizard_steps_priceTiers_tier2_message: Your project is well feasible, the price is in the middle range.
wizard_steps_priceTiers_tier3_message: Your project is demanding, the price is in the upper range.
wizard_steps_priceTiers_tier4_message: Oh, that's a lot you're asking for. We're certainly above XXX€.
wizard_design_colorSchemeDescription: Select the main colors for your project. If you already have corporate colors, enter them here.
wizard_design_fontDescription: Select a font from our selection or specify your corporate font.
wizard_design_otherGoogleFonts: I'd rather use a different Google Font
wizard_design_customFontPlaceholder: e.g. Helvetica Neue, Arial, Corporate Font Name...
wizard_design_fontPreview: Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Reiciendis minima officia eveniet fugiat ad dicta quia optio quod!
wizard_content_pages_pageNamePlaceholder: e.g. Home, About us, Contact, Services...
wizard_content_pages_pageContentPlacehol: Describe what content should be on this page: Texts, images, functions, etc.
wizard_content_pages_pageCharacteristicP: Which features should be placed on this page? Should content suggestions be developed or should content be used exactly as specified?
wizard_content_formFields_description: Since you have selected a contact form, define the desired fields and their labels here.
wizard_navigation_register_tooltip: and go on using the extended configurator
wizard_loading_description: Please wait while we process your project.
wizard_modals_error_description: The following errors occurred when submitting your project:
wizard_modals_error_whatHappensDescripti: After closing this dialog, you will be redirected to step 1. Your entries will be retained so that you can fix the problem and try again.
wizard_modals_error_noPreUploaded: No pre-uploaded assets found, uploading now...
wizard_modals_error_customerLinkingFaile: Customer linking failed, but project was created:
wizard_modals_error_waiting: Waiting 3 seconds before publishing to ensure data consistency...
wizard_modals_error_noAssetsPublished: No assets could be published, but project was created and published
wizard_modals_error_networkError: Network error: Connection to server failed
wizard_modals_error_checkConnection: Please check your internet connection and try again.
wizard_modals_thankYou_subtitle: Your project has been submitted successfully
wizard_modals_thankYou_steps_step1: We review your request within 24 hours
wizard_modals_thankYou_steps_step2: You receive a detailed offer by email
wizard_modals_thankYou_steps_step3: We schedule an appointment for a personal conversation
wizard_modals_reset_description: Do you really want to start over? All your previous entries will be lost.
wizard_modals_contact_title: Contact us and let's get started
wizard_modals_contact_description: What happens next? You can contact us here to discuss the next steps or get started right away if everything is clear and you're fully convinced. You can create your own account here and capture your project in the detailed configurator / wizard and submit it to us.
wizard_form_projectDescription_subTitle: Describe your project in detail here...
wizard_form_targetAudiencePlaceholder: e.g. Small businesses, individuals, B2B customers...
wizard_form_goalsPlaceholder: e.g. Acquire more customers, digitize processes...
wizard_form_inspiration: Are there websites that can serve as inspiration?
wizard_form_customFeaturesPlaceholder: Describe additional special requirements that are not in the list...
wizard_form_placeholders_webApplication: Describe in detail the desired functions and features of your application: What main functions should it have? How should users interact with it? What data will be processed? Are there special requirements for performance or security?
wizard_form_placeholders_freestyle: Describe your individual project in detail: What problem should be solved? What specific requirements do you have? Which systems should be integrated? Which functions are particularly important?
wizard_form_placeholders_default: Describe your project in detail: What is the goal? What problems should it solve? Which target group are you addressing? Do you already have concrete ideas about design or functions?
